title: (33680) Collanzo - 47 Carretera General
description: In the center of Collanzo. An esplanade of land next to the church. It is not very level. At night it is quiet. Access is good for any vehicle.

title: (33681) La Paraya - 12 Caserio la Paraya
description: Parking where to start hiking and mountain biking routes. Right next to the road. Route signpost. The valley is beautiful. Crossing the gorges of the Aller river is spectacular.

title: (33680) - AS-253
description: Small car park in an old bend, good for a lunch break, especially since there is nothing like it from the Puerto de San Isidro pass down the mountain

title: (33681) Asturias - 50 Caserio Rio Aller
description: Parking right at the entrance of the Ruayer / Rioaller town, somewhat uneven. It is a good place to park and start walking and riding a mountain bike. In the case of wanting to sleep, it is necessary to put on the van. Crossing the gorges of the river Aller with the van is amazing, a real treat for the eyes! A good start to make routes through the council of Aller. Attention: it is not advisable to cross the bridge towards the town, the road narrows a lot and already through the streets of the town it is really fair, at most a medium van (an AC or a large volume impossible!). The road ends in the village, then follows an ideal trail for walking or mountain biking.

title: (33686) Pelugano - 6 Lugar Pelugano
description: Small car park in the center of town. Fairly level and very quiet. We slept one night with no problems. The town is very quiet and no inhabitant told us anything about spending the night there. There is a fountain next to it and a soccer and basketball court. Containers nearby too. Starting point for several mountain and climbing routes.

title: (33686) Levinco - AS-253
description: Parking next to the national. We spent the night there to do the Peña Mea route, since we were going with AC and in Pelugano there is no place to park AC. Between 22:00 and 08:00 the train does not pass and very few cars.

title: (33685) Bello - Mirador de Coto Bello, Unnamed Road
title_short: (33685) Bello - Mirador de Coto Bello, Unnamed Road
description: Incredible place surrounded by stunning views! There are cows and horses near, you can hear their cowbells; they even came visit! Very quiet, cold place even in summer (it’s over 1000m high), few people came by to see the views during daytime. Easy access.

address.street: Mirador de Coto Bello, Unnamed Road

title: (33686) Cabañaquinta - 7 Aldea Rozada
description:
Parking next to a picnic area and a short walk.
Easy access from ring road.
A five-minute walk, along the sidewalk, from the town center, with supermarkets, shops and bars.

title: (33676) - AE-3
description: Free public parking. It's the beginning of a hiking route to visit a very beautiful waterfall in Spain.

title: (33686) Soto - 1 Aldea Miravalles
description: Church with recreational area next to a river. The villagers have indicated this place to us, they have been very kind. Follow the indications to miravalles.

title: (33676) - 1 AE-3
description: New parking in Murias de Aller, near the Xurbeo Waterfall

title: (33688) -
description: It is a recreational area in Cuevas (Asturies), known as "Les Moyaes". It is next to the company "Agua de Cuevas". Parking area, without delimiting. The space has several fountains, an area with tables and trees.

title: (33685) Serrapio - 92 Barrio la Barraca
description: Parking of the chapel of San Vicente de Serrapio (Aller) and its viewpoint. Very good place for a stop to eat and enjoy its magnificent views of the Alto Aller valley and the beautiful Serrapio chapel, it is worth it. Facing the night, it is a good place, with the first squares a little inclined and the second ones better leveled ... Good access for vans and AC, although the parking for AC is a bit small ... It is better for vans .... Quiet and pleasant place to spend the day and sleep. Highly recommended place!

title: (33986) Navaliego - AS-252
description: ALTO DE LA COLLADONA Quiet place. At the foot of the road. Room for 4-5 vans.

title: (24844) -
description: Parking by the port to go on excursions. good place in winter on foot of snow. A few kilometers old civil war bunker.

title: (33688) - AS-253
description: Flat space in the hairpin of the bend with a magnificent view of the valley. Previously the accessible area was bigger, rocks block the access and it remains the part in gravel .. What does not prevent to find many papers toilet to the abandonment. I did not sleep, I just indicate the place, this valley from San Isidor station is beautiful.

name: El trasgu la Fronda
title: (33989) El trasgu la Fronda
description: Zone at the foot of the road to park while visiting the Farm of El trasgu la frond, place of several activities for the kids. If you go with a Van you can enter through the entrance of the farm, turning to enter down, the turn is complicated even with a car. the cars or large volume I do not see clearly that they can make the entrance. We the owners accompanied us to the designated field and we went down on foot, we were going with 7.40mts.

title: (33688) Aller - AS-112
description: Beautiful and very good place to eat, rest, sleep ... Next to the road from the port of San Isidro (Asturias), almost reaching the top, there is a flat area, well leveled, which is accessed by a good suitable path for vans and large volume (perhaps the AC have problems in the initial access from the road ..... to assess ....). A little close to the highway which at night and in summer has very little traffic, which is hardly annoying; in winter and during the day, being next to the Fuentes de Invierno and San Isidro ski resorts can be a bit more bothering. Beautiful views of the Sierra de Fuentes de Invierno! Magnificent sunset! Great starry at night! Very good place to start routes throughout the area. In summer there are a lot of cattle uploaded to this port and its presence is noticeable since it is a pasture area with various cabins near this place that are used.

title: (33993) Rioseco - 87 Lugar Soto
description: Agues Soto. Parking next to the Alba road. Quiet in a beautiful village in the Redes Natural Park.

title: (33610) - 1 Lugar Colladiella
description: Parking in the Colladiella area. Quite steep. Ideal for hiking trips. 4G and DTT coverage

name: Camping-Restaurante Los Arrudos
title: (33995) Camping-Restaurante Los Arrudos
description: Camping in Caleao. Individual plots with water, electricity and barbecue. It is at the starting point of the path of Los Arrudos, a beautiful mountain route through a gorge. The restaurant is extraordinary, very spacious and with a highly recommended menu and with very good prices. A discovery. with all loading and unloading services for motorhomes

title: (33670) Moreda - 43 Avenida Constitución
description: Ecolaundry industrial washing machines.

title: (33675) Moreda - 16 Calle Francisco Palacios
description: Ample and semi-paved parking. Wide and level place, good for parking and if necessary to spend a night. It is next to a mining shaft that no longer works, making it a quiet place. In the town there are supermarkets, a pharmacy, a bakery and a laundromat (although there is already a little out of hand).

title: (33993) - 14 SC-2
description: Leisure area, benches, grills, playground and river to cool off, great views.

title: (24699) Camplongo de Arbás - 57 Calle el Río
title_short: (24699) Camplongo de Arbás - 57 Calle el Río
description: 1200 meters above sea level. Even in the sun, it is very cold in the height of summer. Very nice picnic table and chairs.

title: (33670) - 15 Calle Marqués de Comillas
description: Newly created area. Near the gas station, the sports center and next to the city.

title: (33987) Puente de Arco - 34 LV-5
description: Although in the council of Laviana there is already a motorhome area with emptying of black and gray water and some places to spend the night, I recommend this one more than I propose, for various reasons, the first because of the situation in which it is located, just next to one of the symbols of the Laviana council, Puente de Arcu, a Roman-style bridge, although it dates from the 12th century. In addition to this, if you go through this area in summer, you can enjoy a good swim in the waters of the Nalón river, since just below the parking lot the river has a pool that the local people use as a bathing area. Another point in its favor is its tranquility, since the area of Laviana that I mentioned before, is located right next to the railway line with what it implies. Finally, it should be noted that right next to you you have access to numerous routes on foot or by mountain bike, as well as being at the gates of the beautiful and unknown Redes Natural Park.

title: (33610) - 14 Caserio Fortuna
description:
Car park at the Fortuna Well Interpretation Center (the center is only open on Easter and from June to September).
Level but short squares (no more than 5 m). Quiet place next to the road. There are no signs prohibiting overnight stays or parking with a motorhome.
There is an area with tables and the Turón Valley path that runs through different mine buildings and machinery used in the mines.
Next to it is a monument. It is a large monolith, erected in honor of the 400 people murdered by Francoism and buried in the common grave in the well that is below the monument.

title: (24838) Cármenes - 28A Calle Demetrio Lopez Aller
description: Area with all services (new opening in June 2019), Village at 1330 meters above sea level with 400 inhabitants, near Cueva de Vallporquero, Hoces de Pontedo and Hoces de Vegacervera. Motorhomes up to 9 meters can enter through the door. Only Movistar mobile coverage. Area only for the use of motorhomes and camper. This area has the support of the Castellana y Leonesa de Autocaravanistas association, a representative association of motorhomes in Castilla y León, Only motorhomes and camper

title: (33688) - Acceso Fuentes de Invierno
description: Parking for Motorhomes Winter Station Winter Fountains. Two large parking garages, in the upper one have an area for motor homes. wc / no water / no grays / no (during ski season, baths in the winter resort)

title: (33993) Ladines - SC-2
description: Parking at the entrance of the village

title: (33684) Caborana - 7 Plaza las Nieves
description: Caborana pool and soccer field parking. Wide site, asphalted and well leveled, very good to park and spend a night. The tourist information office is located here. From the car park there is a walking path that goes next to the river and allows you to visit the town.

title: (24838) Cármenes - LE-312
description: Alto de Cármenes with spectacular views of dusk and dawn. Without services Very calm.

title: (33992) Condado - Unnamed Road
description: A dead end road that was once the entrance to the village with a prehistoric Roman fortress. A splashing river and the occasional hiker.

title: (24844) - 31 LE-321
description: Nice place to spend a few days. Beautiful place. Near the Ski de San Isidro station. Many routes for cycling and walking. Recommended and quiet site.

title: (24855) Puebla de Lillo - LE-332
description: Winter resort San Isidro. Parking lot located 2 km from the slopes. Calm.

title: (24855) San Isidro - 1A Lugar Cebolledo
description: San Isidro station parking. Good place to park and spend the night. At the bar they sold us bread. Great for skiing on the slopes. Very quiet at night, at 6:30 pm. a machine starts to catch snow but nothing annoying.

title: (33993) - 101 AS-117
description: Gas station with sale of camping gas cylinders

title: (33993) - 206 Rioseco
description: Quiet parking right in front of the geriatric residence. The road is on the side so it can be a bit noisy but it is very good to stop in Rioseco during the day since, despite not being very large places, there are usually very few cars and plenty of space. It is not a specific site for motorhomes but there is hardly any slope.

title: (24855) San Isidro - AS-253
description: Ski resort car park. Cafeteria restaurant open. Average meal but it does it. We spent the night without spreading out and no problems. No prohibition sign. Calm night in the middle of the herds. Sunset on the massif. Good for a one night stopover.

title: (24855) Puebla de Lillo - Unnamed Road
description: San Isidro ski resort. Ample car parks. At the foot of the route to Lake Absent and very close to the route to Lake Ubales, and at the foot of the ski slopes. In the lower area there is more parking and a hostel with a cafeteria.

title: (24837) Cármenes - LE-315
description: Picnic site at roadside near road junction. Quiet road and silent at night.

title: (33989) Pola de Laviana - Calle José M. Díaz G. Jove
title_short: (33989) Pola de Laviana - Calle José M. Díaz G. Jove
description: A few km from the natural park networks, this area of ​​Laviana. Located in the sports area about 200 m away there are shops, restaurants, bars, playgrounds, swimming pools, etc.

address.street: Calle José M. Díaz G. Jove

title: (33610) Mieres - 66 Lugar el Lago
description: Picnic area on the old HUNOSA road. Less than 500 meters away are the pools of the Turon valley (possibility of eating the menu). In case of making use of the swimming pool, possibility of parking next to the small soccer field in the area. Very quiet area.

title: (33993) -
description: Ample parking at the entrance of the town. Battery seats of about 6 meters. There is a bar-shop with a nice terrace nearby. The bad thing is some huts with hunting dogs that bark and howl quite early in the morning.

title: (33693) Pajares - 86 Poblado Payares
description: Fresh ice-cold spring water from the mountains. By far the best fresh water we have ever found in Spain!

title: (24680) Villamanín - 98 N-630
description: Parking of the roadside hostel, friendly treatment, you can have lunch and dinner, in the morning they open at 7, to spend one night,

title: (33994) - Unnamed Road
description: Views of the reservoir and village of Tanes. We spent the night and only one car passed the next morning at about 11 o'clock. Great night with only the sound of the crickets and a cow roaring every little hehe. Recommended, on this same road there were two other sites before to stop but no views !!

title: (24680) Villamanín - 4D Avenida la Tercia
description: Parking next to the pools and over the top of the town. Fairly plain

title: (33637) - 55 Calle el Palacio

title: (33994) - AS-117
description: Quiet place next to a tank. For a walk to the village of Tanes. Quiet and close to the road.

title: (24855) Puebla de Lillo - LE-331
description: Beautiful rest area on both sides of a stream. Suitable for lunch, but no chance to sleep.

title: (24680) Villamanín -

title_short: (33950) San Martín del Rey Aurelio - 50 Avenida de la Constitución

title: (24843) Lugueros - 15A Carretera General
description: Nice recreational area with river pool to take a good swim, children's area with swings, tables, and solarium. It has a summer bar with drinks, hamburgers and portions.

title: (33990) Les Yanes - AS-117
description: A small area aside the old road. The main road is now a tunnel, so nobody passes here. Very quiet. There’s room for one motorhome only, but there’s a picnic area just next, along the stream.

title: (33629) Tiós - 46 Lugar Tios
description: Campa at the entrance of the town. Very good to spend the night. We ask permission because it is a public area and they did not put us any problem.

title: (33619) Mieres - 12 Aldea Carbonero
description: Picnic area with many tables, grass area and barbecues that as of 8/20/20 do not have grills. There is a lot of shade and lots of unregulated parking. A straight-through water source that may not be treated. Good area to spend a couple of days and even spend the night. Good views of the mountains and very quiet. It can be difficult to get there with motorhomes, vans without problems.

title: (33630) Pola de Lena - A-66
description: Park with a table to eat. Benches and drinking fountain. Overnight stays are allowed but it is 10 meters from the A-66. 200 meters away is the municipal swimming pool that opens in summer. Next to the dog park.

title: (33629) Tiós - LN-6
description: But we had a very quiet night. 4G and perfect DTT reception

title: (33640) Mieres - 13 Calle Doctor Rodríguez Vigil
description: Parking, without services, central hotel and trade all on foot and one step away, Romanesque church, bike rides and on foot in many directions, dirt tracks or along the river in the direction of Mieres or yesterday's Council, nearby river for fishing enthusiasts, concessions via train, Gijón, Oviedo both by train and by bus. in total a very central car park with all the services very central and a 6 km motorhome area in Mieres for loading and unloading, and a very quiet place

title: (33693) Brañillin - 17 Caserio el Brañillin
description:
Motorhome area in Valgrande station - Pajares.
They indicate drinking water, the filling tap is inside the sink to protect it from the cold. At the time of filling us using a carafe the water came out turbid brown. Finally we decided not to fill water.

title: (33630) Pola de Lena -
description: Parking area of the sports center, with all kinds of containers, possibility of entering the municipal swimming pool, with a spectacular bicycle cleaning area. good point to start the climb to the Gamoniteiru!

title: (33990) - Calle Carretera General
description: The Ayuntamiento de Caso informed us that since the summer of 2020 it has enabled this area to park motorhomes and vans. The motorhome service area located within the town does not allow parking. It is not very well maintained but it is a very quiet area.

title: (33630) -
description: Motorhome service area with all services. Next to the town and the A66 motorway. 4G coverage and DTT. It has emptying for Nautical WC. I still pass several restaurants and shops of all kinds. Near the municipal swimming pool and dog park. The local police pass several times a day to write down license plates and enforce the maximum period of stay of 48 hours.

title: (33630) Pola de Lena - 6 Calle Luis Menéndez Pidal
title_short: (33630) Pola de Lena - 6 Calle Luis Menéndez Pidal

title: (33909) Langreo - 5D Calle Puente Carbón
description: Zone next to the ecomuseum of the Samuño.-Night visit essential to the mine, it can stay and tourist train

title_short: (33940) San Martín del Rey Aurelio - 25A Avenida la Vega
description: In a parking lot, it is common to find cars occupying the reserved places, even on the platform. To empty the black water lift the hatch.

title: (24845) Tolibia de Abajo -
description: Amazing place, spacious, quiet and easily accessible. It is very large and is sheltered between trees and the slopes of the mountain. It is accessed by the path that I indicate in the photo. if you cross the small stream there is even more space and more hidden. Well leveled for the most part.

title: (33990) Campo de Caso - 3D Calle Carretera General
title_short: (33990) Campo de Caso - 3D Calle Carretera General
description: Services area next to the Interpretation Center of the Parque de aRedes.

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 3A Lugar Valporquero Tor
description: Watchtower. You can stop and stay overnight without problems. Near the village. Spectacular views. If you like the mountain visit this town. Do not forget to visit the Cave. There are no services, but you will sleep almost in heaven. Very quiet town.

title: (33616) - 8 Caserio Carbayon
description: picnic area with tables surrounded by nature. there are bins and a water fountain. very beautiful environment

title_short: (33940) San Martín del Rey Aurelio - 21 Calle Luis Adaro Magro
description: Without a doubt, there will be a better and more beautiful corner nearby, but to get away we put ourselves in this country, wide enough, firm and level, to spend the night. A little movement of the car and little else, it was a quiet place. No service of any kind or charm whatsoever. Located next to an institute and a street from the station. Battle solution if you are in a hurry.

title: (33627) - Área de descanso
description: Rest area on the highway with a large parking area. Picnic area with some tables from which you can see the mountains. Beautiful scenery. No services. For a perfect stop to eat and rest.

title: (33947) San Martín del Rey Aurelio - 18 Trabanquín
title_short: (33947) San Martín del Rey Aurelio - 18 Trabanquín

title_short: (24837) Vegacervera - Carretera de Valporquero de Torio a Felmín

address.street: Carretera de Valporquero de Torio a Felmín

title: (33619) Mieres - Calle El Encauce
description: Good picnic site if you catch a route, with a playground for children. It has a good parking lot if you want to sleep.

title: (33619) Mieres - 1 Avenida del Camino
description: Laundry in shopping center. The vast majority of stores closed, difficult to get change. The machine only accepts 5 and 10 euro bills. Price washing machines 5 euros. Dryer 4 euros 18 minutes. Large outdoor car park. Totally desert Sunday.

title: (24845) Tolibia de Abajo -
description: Small spot by a river, road is nearby, but quiet.

title: (33990) Campo de Caso - Unnamed Road
description: Collada de Pando recreational area; beautiful and very quiet place, a little uneven, space for 6 vehicles. Not suitable for motorhomes or vans, as the road is steep and narrow.

title: (24855) Isoba - 2A Lugar Isoba
description: Gravel parking of Lake Isoba. Large, not flat in places but ok with wedges, road to side but very little busy. There are other small spots in the grass at the entrance. Very nice corner, starting a small hiking trail. Herd of cows. There were hunters that day, shooting a chamois on the hill next to it.

title: (33900) Langreo -
description: Mixed parking with spaces reserved for ac. No services. Leveled. Near the train tracks. In the center near restaurants, cider houses and supermarkets. Good situation.

title: (33616) Murias - 4 Calle I
description: The best option if for some reason you have to spend the night in Mieres, the car park is next to a road but quite quiet

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 35 LE-315
description: Good place next to the river.

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 36 LE-315
description: Excellent enclave in the gorge. Without services and with a river and mountains nearby. Please do not leave trash or toilet paper.

title: (33600) Mieres -
description: Perfect parking to spend the night. Very quiet to spend the night. Very close to the center and winged supermarkets. The concentration of caravanistas of Asturias is celebrated every year.

title: (24837) Valdeteja - 69A Lugar Valdeteja
description: Good place to stay and climb the top of Peña LaVerde (Valdeteja)

title: (33990) Nieves - 41A Lugar Nieves
description: Ample parking at the entrance of the town. In the natural park of Redes. Perfect for hiking trails.

title: (33909) Langreo - 3 Paseo Llerones
description:
Parking next to schools and institutes, so at night it is very quiet. The road only leads to schools so there are no cars. At night it is common for the police to patrol. Right next to it there is a descent to the river, where there is a fountain, picnic tables and wastebaskets. There are two pedestrian bridges that lead to the urban center (200 meters) where there are bars, shops, pharmacies...
BEWARE: In that area, circulation is not allowed (if parking) on school days at the time of entry and exit of school, so if you want to arrive or leave at the end of classes you have to wait for the children to leave .

title: (33693) Brañillin -
description: Rest area without services

title: (33600) Mieres - 44 Calle Numa Guilhou
description: Asphalted parking without services. Very quiet and close to the center and shops

title: (24688) Villamanín - Barrio Triana
description: An excellent place to spend the day next to the Casares reservoir, after completing the excellent Via Ferrata de flores and Arbas Valley lagoon. It is accessed by paved road, although it does not appear on Google Maps.

name: Camping Las Hoces de Vegacervera
title: (24836) Camping Las Hoces de Vegacervera
description: Camping 600m from Vegacervera, very quiet, with very new and well-kept facilities. It has a cafeteria with mixed dishes and a menu of the day, they also offer the typical dish of the area, which would be goat cured meat. Perfect base of operations to visit the sickles or towns in the area such as Val Porquero and its cave, Pico Polvoreda along with the Valle del Marqués or the Faedo de Orzonaga among others. It has an active tourism company that offers speleo-canyoning in the Val Porquero cave or different nearby ferratas.

title: (33618) Mieres del Camino - A-66
description: Free parking for 6 campers, free parking, maximum 48 hours

title: (24670) La Pola de Gordón - 32 Carretera la Vid
title_short: (24670) La Pola de Gordón - 32 Carretera la Vid
description: A beautiful place to stop to rest and even sleep surrounded by the magnificent landscape of the Vegacervera region. There are several groups of oak trees that shade at different times of the day. Nearby are the Vegacervera Gorges and Valporquero Caves. Don't forget to try the Coladilla village or  Vegacervera

title: (33616) - 13 Aldea la Matinada
description: Recreational area near Mieres with great views of the Asturian mountain. On good days you can see the city of Oviedo in the distance. It is a good place to spend the day and spend the night surrounded by nature.

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 8 LE-315
description: Esplanade with roundabout in the center of town. In mid-May we slept alone and very calm. Next to a repsol deposit. In a corner, in case buses came to turn around, although we didn't see any.

title: (24688) Villamanín - Barrio Triana
description: Reservoir parking, cement base and fairly level. Beautiful views. Down to the parking lot somewhat steep.

title: (24855) Puebla de Lillo - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area Hermitage of Pegaruas. 1.5 km from the road. It is accessed by track without asphalt but it is possible to access with a motorhome, with care. The full nature, next to a creek. Very kempt. Several tables, shadow. Hiking trails.

title: (33909) Langreo - 21 Calle Jovellanos
description: Ample parking, quiet, without services, near the center of La Felguera and Sama.

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 2 LE-311
description: Picnic at the entrance to the town of Vegacervera, with an information office in the area. Hiking trails, Hoces de Vegacervera and indoor climbing wall and good restaurants. Goat cecina is eaten.

title: (33996) Bezanes - AS-117
description: Fairly large flat car park in Bezanes on AS117 15 km before the Col de Tarna. Quiet away from the road. In nature and greenery. Risk of being awakened by departure of a local bus during the week. We had a good night.

title: (24660) Ciñera - 591 Travesía Galicia
description: Day parking to do the Faedo de Ciñera route (for children) or to the Valporquero caves. Important: further on is the bus stop with a canopy. Do not park there. Nearby there is also a wide ticket to park but I do not advise going through the town because it has narrow streets. If you are going to spend the night, it is better to go to the Pola de Gordón Motorhome Area, approximately 8km away.

title: (33949) Langreo - 7 Calle Dolores Ibárruri
description: Large municipal parking lot in La Fulguera, langreo. In the center of town, with bars, restaurants, etc...

title: (33619) Mieres - 29 Lugar la Peña
description: Parking for 4 motorhomes or 6 cars, next to it there is a picnic area with a large meadow, the highway is above it but it is not very noisy, there is a stream next to it that is great for animals.

title: (33949) Langreo - 22 Calle Pepita Fernández Duro
description: Ac parking next to the gas station. It lacks services, the gas station has a shop and cafeteria with a good assortment of skewers in the mornings.

title: (33639) Culquera de Arriba - AS-231
description: Large esplanade fairly flat. With beautiful views of the Lena, Quirós and Mieres valleys. Perfect 4G and DTT coverage

title: (33529) Nava - Unnamed Road
description:
Cows, horses and views and peace.
 Steep driveway with no real off-road challenge.  Up there, you can drive but through the mountains.

title: (24836) - 2A Lugar Villalfeide
description: Esplanade next to the church, the town 3 minutes walk. If you like the mountain, you have the powdery peak, incredible views. There is also a greenway and the river right next to it. a marvel.

title: (24855) Puebla de Lillo - 31 LE-333
description: Picnic area, side of the road, little traveled, with parking spaces on both sides of the road, wide and sunny, starting point of the Pinzón valley route, Isoba, where you can visit the Forfogones waterfalls.

title: (24650) Santa Lucía de Gordón - Unnamed Road
title_short: (24650) Santa Lucía de Gordón - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area with tables and trees next to the river. The access is leaving the national road, crossing it below and after passing the train track to the left. Very quiet, I spent one night alone and only heard the train go by. Be careful, not suitable for tall vans or motorhomes, you pass a tunnel that does not reach 2.5m

title: (33682) Mieres - 200A Barrio Pachón
description:
vehicle parking
don't worry
next to a river
perfect to rest

title: (33638) Asturias - Camino As Pr-83
description: Valle del Peral Recreational Area. Quiet area for the night and with barbecues. From May to October it has an open bar with services.

title: (24857) Cofiñal - 64A Calle El Barrio
description: Fountain by the road. Easy parking. Good flow. Better than the fountain in the picnic area since you can park next to it and the faucet has a thread.

title: (33638) Asturias - AS-230
description: Beautiful fairly flat esplanade overlooking the Valle de la Peral. Perfect 4G and DTT coverage

title: (24846) Nocedo de Curueño -
description: Great place to rest by the river. Somewhat hidden source.

title: (24855) Puebla de Lillo - 67 LE-331
description: Pylon of drinking water, without tap or tap, only water pipe. You can get close to the side and with a small hose load your tank.

title: (33117) El Molino - 22 AS-230
description: At the top of the cobertoria, quite flat gravel parking. Several hiking trails. Good place to see stage of the return or ascend by bicycle the gamoniteiro, the coverage and other nearby ports. On the roads that are next can also be accessed and parking, with some more slope in the terrain.

title: (33117) - Unnamed Road
description: Clearing in flat grass in a bend, in the middle of the mountain, road in cul de sac until the antenna thus very little passing. Paragliding flight area.

title: (33997) Pendones - 16 Lugar Pendones
description: Public parking in the center of the city with a breathtaking view of the Redes Natural Park. I do not know if large motorhomes can access, ideal for pickup trucks.

title: (33537) Riofabar - PI-4
description: Very nice place to spend the day and night, with tables, barbecue areas and the river next door. The fountain had no water. From here you start a high mountain route, with the possibility of only part of it. to get there, you will pass through Espinaredo, the town with the horrios de asturias, it is worth stopping to visit it and passing cider;)

title: (33117) Llanuces -
description: Beautiful place to spend the night. Very nice view of the mountain range. Horses and cows as a neighbor. Access is via a fairly steep path. We were able to mount it with a small motorhome.

title: (33929) Langreo - 1A Poligono Industrial Riaño III
description: Area next to a Masymas supermarket, with gas station. It is not officially opened yet, it has no water. But it is possible to empty gray and black deposits.

title: (33117) Asturias - 130A Lugar Murias
description: Through a narrow asphalt road, almost flat grassland on a ridge with beautiful east / west views. Very quiet, road not at all busy. 50m higher there are other locations, and surely further still just on the radar at the very top. On the passage of a GR.

title: (24857) Cofiñal - 40 LE-333
description: Small spot along the road, nice space to land big enough for a few motorhomes. The view is magnificent with the cows and the mountains as the only company. No service just nature.

title: (24855) - 16A Lugar Puebla Lillo
description: In front of the municipal swimming pools, next to the park, there is a parking lot and a very quiet long and wide street. In the park there is a water fountain, barbecues and benches. Good place to spend the night.

name: Camping Las Nieves
title: (24855) Camping Las Nieves
description: Nice little campsite at the foot of a beech forest. Flat and with grass, it is very quiet, it has a little old but clean bathrooms. Restaurant bar with delicious burgers. Ideal place for hiking, biking and skiing.

title: (33529) Nava - 69 Lugar Piloñeta
description: Nice and quiet place at the foot of Les Praeres, a mountain pass. Large area with level parts and all surrounded by green. Attached to the river and without night traffic

title: (24855) León - 16A Lugar Puebla Lillo
description: Closed road quieter place than the one on the road

title: (33117) Asturias - 141A Lugar Llanuces
description: Viewpoint with parking in the middle of the road next to a small meadow that is months old and has impressive views. Almost no cars passed during the night. It has enough space for several vehicles, although we were completely alone. It has no source or garbage. It's fine to spend a night or stop to eat if you're on the way.

title: (24855) León - Carretera de Redipollos s/n
description: Emptying point for gray and black water and the possibility of filling the drinking water tank. Free for those who spend the night at the campsite and paying if you are passing through.

title: (24854) Valdehuesa - Unnamed Road
description: Huge parking lot not far from the lake. Far from the road so quiet .. possibility of swimming while walking about 500 m

title: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 23 Calle Luis Vives
title_short: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 23 Calle Luis Vives
description: Located on N-630, 500m detour to enter La Pola de Gordon, free services, located in the center of town next to the river, green area, magnificent views, countless routes, civil war trenches, forests, 1600m mountains , etc. It has all the free services. There are few spaces but you can park along the paved river. There is another parking for motorhomes enabled on Calle Capitán Lozano.

title: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 18D Calle Capitán Lozano
title_short: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 18D Calle Capitán Lozano
description: New motorhomes area, since the city of Pola has added this area to the existing one. . It does not have water service, which has to be done in the old one. Next to the river, not far from the railway line. Little unevenness, almost flat. Not paved. Good access.

name: Las Cuevas
title: (24846) Las Cuevas
description: Super nice quiet campsite on a river where you can cool off. The campsite has a chiringuito a little further away, with tapas/sandwiches. Many beautiful hiking trails can be reached from the campsite. The campsite can be reached by very narrow roads, with a fiat Ducato L3H3 this worked fine, but beware if you are taller (wider!). A baker comes by 1 x a day (note the horn) with sandwiches and goodies

name: Camping Bosque de Gordón S.L.
title: (24600) Camping Bosque de Gordón S.L.
description: Camping Bosque de Gordón SL

title: (33160) La Ara - 21D Calle la Mina
description: Next to the sports center. Asphalted and fairly flat. It does not have AC services but an ideal place to park AC, especially for bike routes.

title: (24608) La Pola de Gordón - LE-473
description: Small space (probably 2 motorhomes) on the side of the road just before the pass. As next to the road, no barriers or facilities, but the lack of facilities is compensated by views! Very quiet night, we did not hear the traffic

title: (24688) Villamanín - LE-3503
description: Next to the road but not a lot of traffic. Fantastic views over the valley. Hiking, climbing and canoeing trails nearby.

title: (24846) Valdepiélago - 1A Lugar Montuerto
description: River beach with good access. The bathrooms are closed, but it seems that in summer they set up a beach bar. Great for spending the night by the river, springboard for the Nocedo waterfalls.

title: (33997) Tarna -
description: Small car park in the center of Tarna, it is a normal, flat car park, in the center of town (about 10 inhabitants in winter) with a winged bar where you can have breakfast and start the monayyu tabayon route, perfect for one night before performing this route

title: (33628) Tuiza de Arriba - 6 Lugar Tuiza Riba
title_short: (33628) Tuiza de Arriba - 6 Lugar Tuiza Riba
description:
End of the road. Plenty of places. There is a fountain and picnic tables. 
From there the trail towards Ubiñas mountains starts.

title: (24146) Sena de Luna - LE-473
description: Great place for the night right on the street. Beautiful sunset, great starry sky - and extremely quiet. However, you stand a little at an angle here and it could be muddy during / after rain. Side by side there is easily enough space for 4-5 campers / mobile homes.

title: (24146) Caldas de Luna - s/n A-66
description: Paved parking just 30 meters from the Caldas de Luna spa, a restaurant and some houses a little far from the town. The location is right at the beginning of the Las Brañas de Caldas route. Slightly uneven. It is not necessary to enter the narrow streets of Caldas, it is enough to turn off following the indications to the spa that appear less than 1 km from the entrance to the town and that runs almost parallel to the highway, which is very close but is not heard during the night. Surrounded by mountains and next to an inaccessible stream.

title: (33161) Lugar de Arriba - 9 Calle la Huertica
title_short: (33161) Lugar de Arriba - 9 Calle la Huertica
description: Free motorhome parking, very quiet area. Ideal to start a road bike ride to Angliru.

title: (33529) Nava - 7 Caserio Gamoneu
description: Stop-over and overnight parking for home vehicles enabled by the Nava City Council. This new space, located just 800 meters from the center of the town, doubles the places of the previous one and will allow us to know and enjoy, in addition to the hotel industry and local commerce, everything that the naveto council offers us, which is not little.

title: (33161) Lugar de Abajo - 16 Carretera General
description: We spend the night and use the car park to leave the motorhome and ride the Angliru by bicycle. We ask in the town and without problems. There are toilets in the sports bar

title: (24847) Valdepiélago - 3A Calle el Puente
description: Free, quiet parking area parallel to the main road. Several parking spaces, on asphalt or cement. Public fountain and trash containers next door. Also a medieval bridge over the Curueño river.

title: (33520) Nava - 1 Calle la Vega
description: Coin laundry eco laundry

title: (24146) Aralla de Luna - LE-473
description: Amazing views over the valley on a very quiet road. Flat. Space for one or two max.

title: (33529) Nava - 3 Camino Santa Olaya
description: Parking without services that allows the parking of motorhomes. Perfect to know the town and highly recommended to see the end of stage of the Vuelta de España

title: (24146) Sena de Luna - Autopista de la Plata
title_short: (24146) Sena de Luna - Autopista de la Plata
description: Parking near the gas station 24h, mountain highway with many tunnels and curves

title: (24847) Valdepiélago - 13A Avenida Jaime Lobo Asenjo
description: Wide jacket next to the river. It is possible to park in the shade for most of the day. Very quiet and pleasant site with access to the river.

title: (24830) Barrio Estación - 4A Calle San Bartolomé
description: Parking of the municipal swimming pool. Freshly paved, sports court and bar. Sleeps well and few cars during the day outside of the pool season

title: (24146) Sena de Luna - Autopista de la Plata
title_short: (24146) Sena de Luna - Autopista de la Plata
description: Lighted area with gas station on the other side of the highway. mountain highway with many tunnels and curves. Trucks sleep trucks there.

title: (33938) Asturias - 2032A Lugar Castro
description: Not very good access, before entering I went up to turn around because the turn was too steep. tables, barbecue and drinking water

title: (33669) Olloniego - 2D Caserio San Pelayo
description: It is a Recreation Area at the entrance of the Town, we asked the neighbors and they told us that there was no problem sleeping there as long as we did not park inside the Area (it is delimited). We spent two amazing nights in the shade and practically alone. The neighbors told us routes to do, places to see and drinking water sources in the surroundings, without a doubt a fantastic place to disconnect :)

name: La Cota
title: (24847) La Cota
description: Camping very quiet and family. The weight is very nice and the plots are very spacious. It has spectacular views and is a very suitable area to have many sports activities suitable for the whole Family.

title: (24854) Boñar - LE-331
description: Recreational area, flat parking, then grassy area behind the gates, the river is next, it's in the middle of the forest. The path is narrow and a little hole but it does, a few branches across.

title: (24839) Matallana de Torío - 27 Avenida León
description: Land parking next to the hermitage. There is a picnic table. It is accessed by a very narrow dirt road, only for vans.

title: (24854) Boñar - LE-331
description: Mirador parking, flat, nice view, trash.

title: (24609) La Pola de Gordón - 1022 Barrio Buen Suceso
title_short: (24609) La Pola de Gordón - 1022 Barrio Buen Suceso
description: Picnic area near the road and next to a hermitage. With shade and tables. very nice to eat even sleep

title: (33529) Nava - AS-333
description:
Picnic area 4 mins outside of Nava with stream, picnic benches, fire and BBQ pits and swing.
2 parking areas, 1 either end of picnic area, reasonably flat.
Used by locals. some road noise.

title: (24839) Robles de la Valcueva - 18a Avenida León
title_short: (24839) Robles de la Valcueva - 18a Avenida León
description: Very good place with several places to bathe with shady pools and tables. Quiet and calm to spend the night

title: (24854) Boñar - 12 LE-331
description: Flat parking with panoramic hook-shaped view of the main road.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Surrounded by nature, site for a motorhome or a couple of vans. The road is narrow with some slope but accessible. Several nearby hiking trails.

title: (24854) Boñar - LE-331
description: Small flat area below the ornithological observatory for a van or two. At the lake with a magnificent view of the mountains. Swimming possible. ATTENTION the access is a little difficult by a short way with deep ruts. Impossible in camping car. Better to park on the side of the road to have a look at the state of the road before committing.

title: (33162) Santa Eulalia-Morcín - 9 Calle Pumarín
description: Service area and parking reserved for 4 or 5 motorhomes next to a recreational area. There is also a parking with more seats. The village is about 200 meters across the recreational area

title: (33160) Grandiella - 12 RI-2
description: Viapara area. Area with tables and barbecues. At the start of the hardest part of the ascent to the Angliru you will see the cyclists pale before what awaits them. It is not easy to park flat, 200 m before there is an esplanade.

title: (33580) Sorrobín - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, there is a tap with drinking water, tables and trash cans.

title: (24146) Sena de Luna - LE-3418
description: Quiet place to stop to eat, sleep nap even overnight. I do not think there is a problem. It's next to the swamp. There is no service at all.

title: (24840) Valdepiélago - 34 Calle el Río
description: Picnic area with shadows and tables and nearby stream enabled for bathing. A bar with very friendly people, overnight allowed discreetly, they even left the ladies' toilet open to use it.

title: (33117) Santa Marina - 1 Carretera General Bárzana
description: Authorized parking for motorhomes. level squares. It's ok in case you can't use the RV area located in the town of Barzana during cattle fairs.

title: (24648) La Robla - Calle El Calbo
description: Esplanade with water, swings and sports ground

title: (33117) - 198A Lugar la Villa
description: Nice parking high in the mountains. Very very quiet. Further up the road you enter the mountains. Many km of beautiful walking among high peaks. Amazing views from the ermita. There is a picnic area with barbecue. The village below has spring water and municipal bins.  Access is very steep so powerful vans only.

title: (24146) Sena de Luna - LE-3418
description: Next to the lake. Near populated area with restaurant, caldas de luna, but very quiet with the full view is a spectacular site

title: (33116) Ricabo - 69A Lugar Ricabo
description: Picnic area upstream of the Ricabo valley. Access for large vehicles will be difficult, small trucks will be able to pass through narrow alleys and curves. Beautiful mountain views, paved parking lot, picnic benches, drinking water, BBQ grills, and a small playground for the kids. This place is in the national park and therefore nights are not allowed. Leave it as neat as we found it.

title: (33519) Pola de Siero -
description: Large parking lot next to the football field and cemetery. Solitary and quiet. Very close to the river and cycling path.

title: (33530) Infiesto - 3 Plaza la Benéfica
description: Infiesto area is new since March 25, 2017

title: (33538) Infiesto - 3 Lugar el Llanu
description: Quiet area next to the sanctuary of the Virgen de la Cueva, with a swimming pool and an area with tables and gardens. Very nice walk to the river.

title: (33530) Infiesto - 13 Calle San Miguel
description: New automatic laundry at 300m, next to a large food ..

title: (33117) Bárzana - 59 Carretera General Bárzana
description: Free municipal area

title: (24996) Maraña - 25 Calle Raimundo Alonso
description: Free camping area, next to the tangle hostel where you can have breakfast and hot sandwiches, or a cold beer. In the hostel they allow the emptying and filling of water totally free. The camping area, without services. Land on grass, slightly sloping.

title: (33539) Asturias - 15 Avenida Pialla
description: Municipal sports center with access to showers with hot water

title: (33117) Bárzana - 25 Poblado Barzana
description: Ample parking, paved, in the center of town. Totally flat. Ideal to make a stop and get to know the surroundings. Perfect 4G and DTT coverage.

title: (24850) Boñar - 1 Polígono Parque Soto
description: Nice, quiet place next to the river, next to the pool. Busy at the weekend, very quiet during the week. Public swimming pool is open until 8 pm, use of showers and toilet possible. Only suitable for short vehicles.

name: Montaña de Riaño y Mampodre, Albergue de Maraña
title: (24996) Montaña de Riaño y Mampodre, Albergue de Maraña
title_short: (24996) Montaña de Riaño y Mampodre, Albergue de Maraña
description: Excellent private Aire.  Beautiful location in the Cantabrian Mtns with stunning views.  12 places, but tight for larger vans. Possible showers at the Auberge if open.  Water and emptying out. Good road access.

title: (33199) Tiñana - C. Fueyo
description:
Beautiful site for vehicles < 6.5 m. On foot from the village church.
It has several restaurants that serve typical Asturian dishes.
With 5G coverage and without DTT coverage.

Green area with a bench.

title: (24640) La Robla - 46 Carretera el Rabizo
description: Parking of the sports center of La Robla. It has plenty of space to park, picnic (behind the pool), No need to adapt.

name: Área de autocaravanas | Camping El Soto
title: (24850) Área de autocaravanas | Camping El Soto
title_short: (24850) Área de autocaravanas | Camping El Soto
description: The pitch is integrated into the campsite, the price includes all services except electricity. As in all areas, you cannot take out tables or awnings or eat outside. The campsite is monitored 24 hours a day. Right next to it is the municipal swimming pool, which is gigantic. When entering the campsite, indicate that you are heading towards the RV area.

name: Camping El Soto
title: (24850) Camping El Soto
description: Campsite El Soto. Terrain in high season, great location and facilities... I wish all campsites were like this.

title: (33580) Pola de Siero - 17 Aldea Ferlera
description: Parking area next to a small industrial estate and civil guard. quiet area where cars pass peaks.

title: (24640) La Robla - 132 Carretera de Matallana
description: Quiet place near the road but without traffic.

title: (24640) La Robla - 25 Carretera la Magdalena
description: Self-service laundry from 8 am to 10 pm from Monday to Sunday.

title: (33510) Pola de Siero - 2 Calle Asturias
description: Public parking with 5 exclusive places for motorhomes, with drinking water services and a discharge point for black and gray water. Although it is next to the train track, it does not pass at night. Tuesday is market day and it is more crowded. Nearby is the train station and the bus station that take about twenty minutes to the cities of Oviedo and Gijón. Shops of all kinds, cafeteria and restaurants. Next to the train station a hiking and bicycle route begins.

title: (33518) Collado - Siero - 6027A Lugar Castro
description: Quiet place to dine and spend the night, great views, no noise. Respect the facilities. Garbage container in the adjoining parking lot for 5 or 6 vans or 2 motorhomes.

title: (24850) Boñar - 2 Calle Escuelas
description: Laundry with washing and drying service for general clothing and pets.

title: (24640) La Robla - 7 Calle Alcalde José Benjamín Villalobos
title_short: (24640) La Robla - 7 Calle Alcalde José Benjamín Villalobos
description: Ramón hardware store. Supply of blue gas cylinders (small)

title: (24850) Boñar - 32 Avenida de la Constitución
description: We parked on the roadside, online. We spent the night and no problem. Close to shops, banks, supermarkets etc. Almost in the center of the city. The GC has gone several times and has not said anything. We stopped here because in the air-conditioned area it was just us and it gave me a lot of insecurity on those dates. We loaded and unloaded in the area, yes.
